name: Hong Kong Patterns - Tiles & Gate
description:
Tiles and gates demonstrate the immerse cultural linkage to Hong Kong history . This file, therefore, is dedicated to spreading the awareness and appreciation of Hong Kong culture and history.


Shout out to: https://www.facebook.com/hkreminiscence/

Check out the page to explore the aesthetics of disappearing cityscapes through still images.
